Summary: As a developer I want to setup Laravel project structure
Acceptance Criteria: Laravel 10+ installed | Environment configured | Git repository initialized

Summary: As a developer I want to configure API routing
Acceptance Criteria: RESTful routes defined | Route groups organized | API versioning setup

Summary: As a developer I want to setup middleware
Acceptance Criteria: CORS middleware | Authentication middleware | Request logging

Summary: As a developer I want to configure error handling
Acceptance Criteria: Standardized error responses | Exception handling | Validation error formatting

Summary: As a developer I want to setup API response structure
Acceptance Criteria: Consistent JSON structure | Status codes standardized | Meta data included

Summary: As a warehouse manager I want to add raw materials via API
Acceptance Criteria: POST /api/materials endpoint | Validation rules applied | Barcode auto-generated | Response includes material data

Summary: As a warehouse manager I want to view all materials
Acceptance Criteria: GET /api/materials endpoint | Pagination support | Filtering by status | Sorting options

Summary: As a warehouse manager I want to view single material
Acceptance Criteria: GET /api/materials/{id} endpoint | Include relationships | Show history

Summary: As a warehouse manager I want to update material info
Acceptance Criteria: PUT /api/materials/{id} endpoint | Validation rules | Prevent weight changes

Summary: As a warehouse manager I want to search materials
Acceptance Criteria: GET /api/materials/search endpoint | Search by barcode | Search by type

Summary: As a developer I want material weight to auto-update
Acceptance Criteria: Decrease weight when used | Calculate remaining weight | Update status (low/consumed)

Summary: As a stage1 worker I want to create stands via API
Acceptance Criteria: POST /api/stage1/stands endpoint | Link to parent material | Generate ST1 barcode | Calculate waste

Summary: As a stage1 worker I want to view all stands
Acceptance Criteria: GET /api/stage1/stands endpoint | Pagination and filters | Include parent info

Summary: As a stage2 worker I want to process stands
Acceptance Criteria: POST /api/stage2/process endpoint | Link to ST1 barcode | Generate ST2 barcode | Track processing details

Summary: As a stage3 worker I want to create coils
Acceptance Criteria: POST /api/stage3/coils endpoint | Link to parent stand | Generate CO3 barcode | Add color and size

Summary: As a stage3 worker I want to view all coils
Acceptance Criteria: GET /api/stage3/coils endpoint | Filter by color/size | Include parent info

Summary: As a stage4 worker I want to create boxes
Acceptance Criteria: POST /api/stage4/boxes endpoint | Link multiple coils | Generate BOX4 barcode | Set packaging type

Summary: As a stage4 worker I want to mark box as shipped
Acceptance Criteria: PUT /api/stage4/boxes/{id}/ship endpoint | Add shipping info | Update status

Summary: As a developer I want validation for stage transitions
Acceptance Criteria: Check parent exists | Validate weights | Prevent double-use

Summary: As a manager I want to track product by barcode
Acceptance Criteria: GET /api/tracking/{barcode} endpoint | Return full chain | Include all stages

Summary: As a manager I want to view product history
Acceptance Criteria: GET /api/products/{id}/history endpoint | Timestamps for each stage | Show transitions

Summary: As a manager I want to search products
Acceptance Criteria: GET /api/products/search endpoint | Search by barcode | Search by date range

Summary: As a developer I want to log all operations
Acceptance Criteria: Log create/update/delete | Store user info | Timestamp all actions

Summary: As a developer I want to setup React/Vue project
Acceptance Criteria: React/Vue installed | ESLint configured | Folder structure created

Summary: As a developer I want to configure routing
Acceptance Criteria: React Router/Vue Router setup | Route guards | Navigation menu

Summary: As a developer I want to setup state management
Acceptance Criteria: Vuex/Redux setup | Store modules | Actions and mutations

Summary: As a developer I want to configure API client
Acceptance Criteria: Axios setup | Base URL config | Interceptors for auth

Summary: As a developer I want to setup UI component library
Acceptance Criteria: Vuetify/Material-UI installed | Theme configured | Base components

Summary: As a manager I want to see dashboard KPIs
Acceptance Criteria: Total materials count | Total production count | Today's production | Waste percentage

Summary: As a manager I want to see production chart
Acceptance Criteria: Line chart for 7 days | Show daily production | Interactive tooltips

Summary: As a manager I want to see waste distribution
Acceptance Criteria: Pie chart by stage | Show percentages | Color-coded

Summary: As a manager I want to see recent activities
Acceptance Criteria: Last 10 operations | Real-time updates | Click to view details

Summary: As a manager I want dashboard to auto-refresh
Acceptance Criteria: Refresh every 30 seconds | Visual indicator | Manual refresh button

Summary: As a warehouse manager I want a form to add materials
Acceptance Criteria: Input fields: type unit weight | Validation messages | Submit button | Success notification

Summary: As a warehouse manager I want to view materials table
Acceptance Criteria: Sortable columns | Pagination | Search/filter | Action buttons

Summary: As a warehouse manager I want to view barcode modal
Acceptance Criteria: Show barcode/QR code | Print button | Copy barcode button

Summary: As a warehouse manager I want to filter materials
Acceptance Criteria: Filter by status | Filter by date range | Filter by type

Summary: As a warehouse manager I want to export materials list
Acceptance Criteria: Export to Excel | Export to PDF | Include filters

Summary: As a database designer I want to create ER diagram
Acceptance Criteria: Identify all entities | Define relationships | Document constraints

Summary: As a database designer I want to design materials table
Acceptance Criteria: Define columns | Set data types | Primary key | Indexes

Summary: As a database designer I want to design production tables
Acceptance Criteria: Stage1-4 tables | Relationships | Foreign keys

Summary: As a database designer I want to design users and auth tables
Acceptance Criteria: Users table | Roles table | Permissions table

Summary: As a developer I want to create database in MySQL
Acceptance Criteria: Create database | Set charset to UTF8MB4 | Configure collation

Summary: As a developer I want to create all tables
Acceptance Criteria: Execute CREATE TABLE statements | Add constraints | Create indexes

Summary: As a developer I want to setup foreign key relationships
Acceptance Criteria: Define foreign keys | Set ON DELETE/UPDATE rules | Test referential integrity

Summary: As a developer I want to create Laravel migrations
Acceptance Criteria: Migration for each table | Up and down methods | Column definitions

Summary: As a developer I want to test migrations
Acceptance Criteria: Test migrate command | Test rollback | Verify schema

Summary: As a developer I want unique barcode format per stage
Acceptance Criteria: WH-XXX-YYYY for warehouse | ST1-XXX-YYYY for stage1 | CO3-XXX-YYYY for stage3 | BOX4-XXX-YYYY for stage4

Summary: As a developer I want auto-incrementing counters
Acceptance Criteria: Separate counter per stage | Zero-padded (001 002 etc) | Reset yearly

Summary: As a system I want to prevent duplicate barcodes
Acceptance Criteria: Check uniqueness | Handle race conditions | Retry on collision

Summary: As a developer I want to parse barcodes
Acceptance Criteria: Extract stage from prefix | Extract number | Extract year | Validate format

Summary: As a system I want to store barcode metadata
Acceptance Criteria: Store generation timestamp | Store generated by user | Store stage

Summary: As a worker I want to scan barcode with camera
Acceptance Criteria: Open camera | Auto-detect barcode | Play beep sound | Display result

Summary: As a worker I want to manually enter barcode
Acceptance Criteria: Text input field | Validation | Auto-format | Submit button

Summary: As a worker I want scan history
Acceptance Criteria: Store last 10 scans | Quick re-scan | Clear history

Summary: As a worker I want error handling for invalid scans
Acceptance Criteria: Clear error message | Suggest corrections | Retry option

Summary: As a developer I want to support multiple barcode types
Acceptance Criteria: QR codes | 1D barcodes | Data Matrix

Summary: As a developer I want to implement JWT authentication
Acceptance Criteria: Install JWT package | Create auth controller | Generate tokens

Summary: As a user I want to login with credentials
Acceptance Criteria: Login endpoint | Validate credentials | Return JWT token

Summary: As a user I want to logout
Acceptance Criteria: Logout endpoint | Invalidate token | Clear session

Summary: As a developer I want to protect routes with auth middleware
Acceptance Criteria: Auth middleware | Token verification | Return 401 if invalid

Summary: As a developer I want to define 4 user roles
Acceptance Criteria: Admin | Manager | Worker | Viewer roles

Summary: As a developer I want to assign permissions to roles
Acceptance Criteria: CRUD permissions | Stage access | Report access

Summary: As a system I want to check user permissions
Acceptance Criteria: Middleware for permissions | Check role | Return 403 if unauthorized

Summary: As a manager I want real-time production statistics
Acceptance Criteria: Total materials | Total stands | Total coils | Total boxes

Summary: As a manager I want waste statistics
Acceptance Criteria: Total waste | Waste by stage | Waste percentage

Summary: As a manager I want today's production summary
Acceptance Criteria: Today's added materials | Today's produced items | Comparison with yesterday

Summary: As a manager I want daily production report
Acceptance Criteria: Report for specific date | All stages production | Waste summary

Summary: As a manager I want weekly production report
Acceptance Criteria: Report for week | Trend analysis | Charts

Summary: As a manager I want monthly production report
Acceptance Criteria: Report for month | Detailed breakdown | Export option

Summary: As a manager I want custom date range reports
Acceptance Criteria: Select start and end date | Generate report | Compare periods

Summary: As a developer I want unit tests for models
Acceptance Criteria: Test all model methods | Test relationships | Test validations

Summary: As a developer I want unit tests for controllers
Acceptance Criteria: Test all controller methods | Mock dependencies | Assert responses

Summary: As a developer I want API integration tests
Acceptance Criteria: Test all endpoints | Test authentication | Test error cases

Summary: As a developer I want component tests
Acceptance Criteria: Test all React/Vue components | Test props | Test events

Summary: As a client I want to test the system with real data
Acceptance Criteria: Provide test scenarios | Test all features | Report bugs

Summary: As a devops engineer I want to setup production server
Acceptance Criteria: Install Ubuntu/CentOS | Configure firewall | Install dependencies

Summary: As a devops engineer I want to install web server
Acceptance Criteria: Install Nginx | Configure virtual hosts | Test configuration

Summary: As a devops engineer I want to migrate database to production
Acceptance Criteria: Export database | Import to production | Run migrations

Summary: As a user I want user guide documentation
Acceptance Criteria: Installation guide | Features guide | Troubleshooting

Summary: As a user I want step-by-step tutorials
Acceptance Criteria: How to add materials | How to track products | How to generate reports
